response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your profits. This product has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards, ensuring reliability and efficiency. Considering its exceptional capabilities and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate, tailored specifically for early adopters like yourself. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
